other_tests.procedure_name: Urinary THF/THF to THE ratio measurement
other_tests.findings: Abnormally high urinary THF to THE ratio (equal to 8.91 for the first proband and 6.41 for the second proband).
other_tests.changes_over_time: THF to THE ratio increased in parallel with the number of mutated alleles.

other_tests.findings: Mild left ventricular hypertrophy (LVH) detected in the first proband.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Partial regression of LVH noted after treatment.

other_tests.findings: Hypokalemia (2.6 mmol/L), low renin (5.4 pg/mL), undetectable aldosterone values.
Hypertensive heterozygous subjects showed higher methylation than wild types.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Mean methylation at HSD11B2 promoter was lower in the two probands compared to heterozygous family members.
